import React,{ useState} from 'react' import { useSpring, animated } from 'react-spring' const Groupe4 = () => { const [animation, setAnimation]=useState(false) const props = useSpring({ to: { opacity: 1 }, from: { opacity: 0 }, config: { duration: 10000 } }) const [up, setUp]= useState('') const [bottom, setBottom]= useState('') const upper=()=>{ up==='' ? setUp('-100px') && setBottom('100px') : setUp('') } return (
